name: CEEMAN - Ustanova za razvoj menedzmenta v Srednji in Vzhodnji Evropi
membership: Besides reciprocal membership with a number of partner associations (http://www.ceeman.org/about-us/ceeman-members/ceeman-exchange-members), CEEMAN is also a full member of the International Network for Quality Assurance Agencies in Higher Education (INQAAHE) and affiliate member of The European Association for Quality Assurance in Higher Education (ENQA).
goal: CEEMAN's objectives are to improve the quality of management development through education, research, consulting, information, networking support, and other related services for management development institutions and corporations operating in dynamically changing environments.
interests: Digital economy and society, Education and training, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: CEEMAN occasionally contributes to Erasmus+ and other EU-funded projects in the area of education and management development.
